meanings.definition: Women serving in an air force.
meanings.sent1: The airwomen trained diligently to become skilled pilots.
meanings.sent2: The airwomen proudly served their country in the air force.
meanings.sent3: The airwomen joked about having wings like birds while flying planes.
meanings.sent4: The airwomen soared through the sky like graceful eagles.
meanings.sent5: The image of the airwomen in their uniforms was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Female members of a flight crew.
meanings.sent1: The airwomen prepared the cabin for takeoff.
meanings.sent2: The airwomen greeted passengers with warm smiles.
meanings.sent3: The airwomen laughed as they demonstrated the safety procedures.
meanings.sent4: The airwomen navigated the turbulent skies with expertise.
meanings.sent5: The airwomen ensured a smooth flight for all aboard the plane.
